title: Accessi.org
creator: Adam
description: Inspired by the growing need to increase knowledge around how to make websites accessible to people with disabilities, Accessi’s unique website accessibility compliance checker is equal parts simple to understand and comprehensive in its testing result against WCAG 2.1.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
